title: In an Otome Game World, I’m a Villain!? I Can’t Accept This! - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Alternate World   Aristocracy   Arranged Marriage   Beautiful Female Lead   Carefree Protagonist   Caring Protagonist   Charismatic Protagonist   Cheats   Childhood Friends   Childhood Love   Clingy Lover   Cross-dressing   Cute Story   Dense Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Doting Older Siblings   Early Romance   Engagement   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Jealousy   Kind Love Interests   Kingdoms   Knights   Love at First Sight   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Love Rivals   Love Triangles   Male Yandere   Modern Knowledge   Obsessive Love   Otome Game   Overprotective Siblings   Persistent Love Interests   Reincarnated in a Game World   Reverse Harem   Rivalry   Royalty   Sister Complex   Unrequited Love   Villainess Noble Girls
author: Sougetsu   蒼月
description:
Mariko Kanzaki, a single office lady in her thirties, apparently got reincarnated in the world of her favorite maiden game as Cecilia, a villain (a death confirmed character)!!

Only the death penalty awaits her at this rate…!

In order to change her destiny, she planned to break off her engagement with Prince Kaiser (a scheming man) but, unexpectedly, she started liking him after he told her: “This is the first time I met someone like you.”!?

Moreover, protagonists with strong personalities started courting her one after the other…?

Enjoy this classic villainess romantic comedy!!>
